name: Nutrients for Life
description: A Virtual Reality Experience to learn about applying nutrients to your crop!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 or equivalent Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1080 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
